sermons.sermon_title: "Loving God With All Your Heart" John 21:15-19

occurrences.context: ...God with all thine heart, with all thy soul and with all thy might. We find a few chapters later in Deuteronomy 10 in verse number 12, the Bible says this, and now Israel, what doth the Lord thy God require of thee...
